name: What, sir?
description:
You wake up in a room with no doors. A stranger offers you to play a game of cards. What do you do?

You play the game, of course.

~

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • C to crouch
  • Space to skip through dialogue/letters
  • Esc to quit/restart the level

~

Created in collaboration with Anastasiia Danyliuk

~

This is a story-based game, so beware of the potential spoilers in the comments.

Feedback is appreciated! The game was originally created for Unexpected Jam (a 2-week long jam).
